name: Corran's mother
content:
A human female was the mother of Corran, a Force-sensitive boy. In 9 BBY, the mother and Corran resided on the planet Daiyu. Wanting to escape the planet, the mother and her son turned to Haja Estree, a con artist pretending to be a Jedi, who agreed to assist the pair in exchange for payment.
Corran's mother first appeared in "Part II" of Obi-Wan Kenobi, which released on May 26, 2022. In it, she was portrayed by Marisé Álvarez, who said the character was named Nyche. However this name has not been used in any canon source.
